org.apereo.cas.support.oauth.web

Class BaseOAuthWrapperController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apereo.cas.support.oauth.web.BaseOAuthWrapperController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OAuth20AccessTokenController, OAuth20AuthorizeController, OAuth20ProfileController

    public abstract class BaseOAuthWrapperController
extends java.lang.Object
    This controller is the base controller for wrapping OAuth protocol in CAS. It finds the right sub controller to call according to the url.
    Since:
    3.5.0
